history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB03448
FULL TITLE : AN ACT MANDATING THE ESTABLISHMENT OF A BIOMETRIC TECHNOLOGY-BASED NATIONAL ELECTRONIC IDENTIFICATION SYSTEM
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : TEVES, ARNOLFO JR. A.
DATE FILED : 2016-09-05
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Reform
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Scheduled for meeting/hearing on 2017-02-08
          -Initial deliberation on 8 February 2017
      2. Under study by the Technical Working Group(TWG) on 2017-03-01
          -TWG meeting held last 1 March 2017
      3. Approved by the Committee on 2017-05-10
          -Approved by the committee the unnumbered bill in substitution of HBs 12,107, 171, 317, 368, 512, 523, 597, 696, 1267, 1687, 1711, 2001, 2167, 2338, 3425, 3448 and 4167
      4. Transmitted to the Committee on Appropriations on 2017-05-10
      5. Scheduled for meeting/hearing on 2017-05-23
      6. Approved by the Committee on Appropriations on 2017-05-23
      7. Approved by the Committee on Appropriations on 2017-05-23
          -Substitute Bill to House Bill Nos. 12, 107, 171, 317, 368, 512, 523, 597, 696, 1267, 1687, 1711, 2001, 2167, 2338, 3425, 3448 and 4167 was approved with amendment.
      8. Committee Report filed on 2017-08-17
          -Committee Report No. 360 on House Bill No. 6221
MOTHER BILL: HB06221
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON POPULATION AND FAMILY RELATIONS ON 2016-09-13
